title: Solution
text:
First, factor the numerator:
x² + $$5x$$ + $$6$$ $$=$$ (x + 2)(x + 3)

Next, factor the denominator:
x² + $$8x$$ + $$12$$ $$=$$ (x + 2)(x + 6)

Then cancel the common factor (x + 2), being careful to note the domain restriction $$x$$ $$ 
eq $$ -2:
(x + 2)(x + 3) / [(x + 2)(x + 6)] → (x + 3)/(x + 6)

Answer: (x + 3)/(x + 6)
